summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1866, for the improvement of Seventeenth Avenue South, from Beacon Avenue to Atlantic Street, and Atlantic Street from Sturgis Road to Twenty-third Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same, under Ordinance No. 19512, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
